column5: Here is a quick summary of this past weekend fishing  Friday was Catfishing as the winds were too high for a pre-fish for a fun tournament that was scheduled for Saturday.  Met up with fishdawg and steve-hamilton and I think each boat managed a new personal best catfish including mine...they grow big in the Grand!!  My new PB! 21.02lbs 34inx22in    fishdawg with one on   Saturday was a fun salmon tournament held in memory of Trevor Field (oldguy), Jello and Aaron Shirley joined me for the day and we had a great time, even managed to win some money to cover expenses and then some.  Total count was 10 for 14 biggest 19lbs  New electronics worked great!           Sunday I had my cousin who is new to salmon fishing out, as well as Uncle Buck.  Fishing was a bit slower and the fish we found on Saturday relocated but we picked away and ended up 4 for 7, biggest about 8-10lbs, by mid-day when we headed home.          See you on the water! Tony
Great job Tony  Some awesome fish there.  That cat is HUGE!!!!  Joey

Great job tony it's always a great time to get out on the water with some good friends.  I wish I'd have known about the tourney for Trevor,  he was a great friend and fishing partner.  Could you please give me a heads up next time.  Glad to see you guys got into some good fish
Great showing in the tourney Tony.  You guys did great!!!  Sherriff
Great report and pics Tony  You guys sure got into some beautiful salmons and good job on the tournament winnings Congratulations on your PB cat     A real hog  Thanks for sharing Leechman
great post tony.......i bet that new boat has seen MUCH fish slime already
Sweet report!  Complete with ugly fish and pretty fish too!  Congrats on the winnings for that tourney...that catfish is huge...I'd love to catch one half half that size!!!
Great stuff Tony. Nice job on getting in the money your first day after salmon!
very nice fish! congrats on the good finish in the tourney!
Excellent report and pics Tony!!!  Good on you for taking OFC members out with you, present and past!  ... tell Jello he has a PM!
Great stuff Tony and mates!! Verado is running great I presume...
Good to see you make a report congrats on the new PB.  I love the shot of the money being fanned
Great job .... ahhh the softwater is finallllly here !
Great too see you guys pulling in the Salmons..  Nice too see some Jello reports
looks like fun day on water
